overview:
David McCann, Vice President of Worldwide Technical Services

David McCann has over 15 years of experience leading enterprise field service and support organizations. Before joining LifeSize in 2005, David held executive and director level positions at InFlow ( acquired by SunGard), MessageOne ( acquired by Dell), SevenSpace (acquired by Sun) where he was instrumental in building customer service focused sales engineering, technical service, support organizations and service offerings.

As Vice President of Worldwide Technical Services at LifeSize, David is responsible for the global technical and customer services organization including, customer care, pre and post sales service, training and professional services.
